content: Excited to announce our next big event: The Generative AI Bootcamp! We will be covering everything from the basics of GANs to advanced diffusion models. Who is excited?
Has anyone experimented with the new multimodal features in the Gemini API? I am working on a project that combines image and text inputs and would love to exchange ideas.
Just pushed a new update to the NeuroLens project on our GitHub. We have improved the summarization accuracy by 12%. Check it out and let us know your feedback!
